text:
Can you add HubSpot module options into a stylesheet? Say I want to give the user padding options can I add into my stylesheet

padding-top: {{ <http://module.padding.top|module.padding.top> }}px;

Hi - is there a way to copy all blog posts from one blog to another (same account) without doing them individually? I have a client that wants to close one of the blogs and combine the posts with a new tag. Thanks!
Hello there, I was wondering if there is a way to remove the “/tag” on a blog topic tag page for SEO purposes?

What is the best practice for including CSS & JS files when developing a theme? Website settings, master template files, or some other method? Asking for a friend :grinning:

PS - We are thinking global CSS & JS resources in the template files & module CSS & JS in each appropriate module.
Hey there Brendan I’m going to DM you something that might answer some of that. Let me know if you have any feedback, it will be a live resource for everyone real soon.

Is it possible to in one that non-live resource action? :v:
We’re also in the middle of figuring out the exact same.
